types.name: fire
types.strategy: Strong against Grass, Bug, Ice, and Steel. Watch out for Water, Rock, and Ground types.

types.name: water
types.strategy: Highly effective against Fire, Ground, and Rock. Keep away from Electric and Grass attacks.

types.name: grass
types.strategy: Great against Water, Ground, and Rock. Vulnerable to Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, and Bug.

types.name: electric
types.strategy: Shocks Water and Flying types. Completely powerless against Ground types.

types.name: ice
types.strategy: Freezes Grass, Ground, Flying, and Dragon types. Weak to Fire, Fighting, Rock, and Steel.

types.name: fighting
types.strategy: Pummels Normal, Ice, Rock, Dark, and Steel. Struggles against Flying, Psychic, and Fairy.

types.name: poison
types.strategy: Toxic to Grass and Fairy types. Weak against Ground and Psychic types.

types.name: ground
types.strategy: Crushes Fire, Electric, Poison, Rock, and Steel. Weak to Water, Grass, and Ice.

types.name: flying
types.strategy: Dominates Grass, Fighting, and Bug. Takes heavy damage from Electric, Ice, and Rock.

types.name: psychic
types.strategy: Overpowers Fighting and Poison types. Vulnerable to Bug, Ghost, and Dark types.

types.name: bug
types.strategy: Effective against Grass, Psychic, and Dark. Easily swatted by Fire, Flying, and Rock.

types.name: rock
types.strategy: Smmashes Fire, Ice, Flying, and Bug. Weak against Water, Grass, Fighting, Ground, and Steel.

types.name: ghost
types.strategy: Spooks Psychic and other Ghost types. Takes extra damage from Ghost and Dark moves.

types.name: dragon
types.strategy: Devastating against other Dragons. Weak to Ice, Fairy, and opposing Dragon types.

types.name: dark
types.strategy: Highly effective against Psychic and Ghost. Weak to Fighting, Bug, and Fairy types.

types.name: steel
types.strategy: Tough against Ice, Rock, and Fairy. Melts under Fire, Fighting, and Ground attacks.

types.name: fairy
types.strategy: Enchants Fighting, Dragon, and Dark types. Weak against Poison and Steel.

types.name: normal
types.strategy: No specific offensive advantages, but immune to Ghost types. Weak to Fighting types.
